name: Acrothea Hotel

reviews.text: Myself , husband and 12 year old daughter stayed here August 17th - 23rd. We were a late booking and I contacted the hotel direct only 5 or so days before we left. Dimitris and Alexandra were very helpful and fortunately they had a room for us. Our room was cleaned well and tastefully decorated , fresh towels daily - we did find it a bit of a squeeze and the bathroom was rather bijou. The location is excellent two entrances/exits one at the top so ideal for parking we had no issues parking even though Parga was incredibly busy - the hotel has 4 or so spaces or there is on street parking. The bottom exit/entrance is straight into Parga town. Our room had air con which was certainly needed in the August heat and the balcony did have a side sea view. Wifi was available and on the whole this was ok , a little up and down. Breakfast was great - lovely view from the terrace and plenty to choose from cereal , bread , lovely cherry jam ! fruit , eggs , meat , juice , teas and coffee. The staff we helpful and especially Dimitris who helped us with directions to find Sarakiniko beach and also Acheron River.
reviews.title: Location , service and a fab view

reviews.title: Must be one of the best hotels in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel is in such a dream location with awesome views of the Ionian Sea and is spotlessly clean. Breakfasts are buffet style very fresh, inviting and eaten on the terrace with the magnificent views. What more could you ask for ? The friendliness and helpfulness of Dimitris the owner and Alexandra is the icing on the cake and they made our stay even more special with their extra special touches on the occasion of our Ruby Wedding. Thankyou to you both we will never forget our time at Acrothea and will be back soon.
reviews.title: The best hotel in Parga!

reviews.text: Staying in this hotel was a pleasure. You can't ask for a better location in the city of Parga. Here you can have a beautiful view over the town and the sea from your room A friendly staff who do their best for you. You can enjoy your breakfast on a terrace with a breathtaking view. You're in the heart of Parga with the harbor, the restaurants and the beach just a few steps away.
reviews.title: Best hotel in town

description: Acrothea Hotel lands in the center of Parga. The rooms and the apartments have great sea view. The atmosphere of the luxury that you can feel in every space of the hotel in combination with the friendliness of the staff creates...the place you want to be!
